title: Oatmeal Cookies With Coconut Flour
directions: Heat the oven to 150 Celsius/ 300 Fahrenheit and line a cookie sheet with baking paper.
With the dough hook mix butter with the sugar and eggs until mixture is smooth and creamy.
Add coconut flour, soda, cinnamon and salt and continue to mix until blended and thick.
Add oats and chocolate chips, or other treats, and blend on low speed 15-10 seconds. No more. Just enough to distribute them evenly in the mixture.
With wet hands, take a teaspoon of the mixture, roll into a ball and flaten.
Arrange the cookies at least 2 cm. apart.
Store up to 10 days outside in a sealed box, or up to three weeks in the refrigerator in a sealed box.
ingredients: 100 gram butter Melted or at room temperature or coconut oil
1/2 teaspoon backing soda can be replaced with backing powder
1/2 teaspoon cinnamon you can add a pinch of cloves if you like
